channel.title: Hy on Modern Emacs
channel.description: Recent content in Hy on Modern Emacs

item.title: A mile Hy - My experience with lispy Python
item.description: Roughly, Hy is to Python as Clojure is to Java. Hy completely inter-ops with Python. I've hit commit 1,500 in my Hy project at work. I wanted to share my experience working with Hy, where I feel it shines and where it falls short. Intro to Hy Basic syntax Hy is a lisp and so uses hyphens as its delimiter. Hy unmangles all hyphens as underscores and mangles all incoming underscores to hyphens.
